edu.uml.cs.isense.comm
Class Connection

java.lang.Object
  edu.uml.cs.isense.comm.Connection

public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object

This class is designed merely to determine if you have an Internet connection on an Android device. This method was originally abstracted from the API class in an effort to remove the Android import requirements of the API class and make API entirely Java-based.

Method Summary
static boolean hasConnectivity(Context c)
          Returns status on whether you are connected to the Internet.

Returns status on whether you are connected to the Internet.
